author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Check out other podcasts here: @TechOverTea

Today we're talking with Matthew Miller the Fedora Project Leader at least until the next release about the recent OBS and Fedora Flatpak situation, why Fedora Flatpak exists in the first and more about the approach that Fedora is taking to Flatpaks and RPMs in the future.
